scripts.docs: rm -rf docs && typedoc packages && grep -rl 'globals.html' docs/* | xargs -i@ sed -i 's/globals.html/index.html/g' @ && mv docs/globals.html docs/index.html
scripts.installLocalElements: cd packages/ai && rm -rf node_modules/@pixano package-lock.json && npm i ../core && cd - && cd packages/graphics-2d && rm -rf node_modules/@pixano package-lock.json && npm i ../core && npm i ../ai && cd - && cd packages/graphics-3d && rm -rf node_modules/@pixano package-lock.json && npm i ../core
